title: Chloé Dygert Lands Top Ten Finish in Her Paris-Roubaix Debut Despite Stomach Issues
content:
American rider shows real promise in her first participation in iconic race: ‘I’m just happy to finish with the best’.

Read the full article at Chloé Dygert Lands Top Ten Finish in Her Paris-Roubaix Debut Despite Stomach Issues on Velo.
author: sstokes
